input_text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item specifications, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone (GSM Factory Unlocked) - Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4GB, 5MP Camera, 3G 900/2100 MHz, International Version - White

Item specifications:
Quad Band 2G, 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz
Dual SIM Support, Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU, 4.3 Inch TFT capacitive touchscreen
768MB RAM, 4GB ROM, Support microSD Slot
5MP Rear Camera + LED Flash, with autofocus, Geo-tagging, touch focus
1800 mAh Battery, Bluetooth, GPS, WiFi, Android 4.3 Jelly Bean
Unlocked cell phones are compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but are not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint.
This cell phone may not include a US warranty as some manufacturers do not honor warranties for international version phones. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Stay connected and productive with the Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone! This unlocked phone is compatible with GSM carriers such as AT&T and T-Mobile, but is not compatible with CDMA carriers such as Verizon and Sprint. With its dual SIM support, you can easily manage your personal and business contacts on one device. It features a 4.3-inch TFT capacitive touchscreen, a 5MP rear camera with LED flash and autofocus, and a 1.2GHz dual-core processor. It runs on Android 4.3 Jelly Bean and comes with 4GB of internal storage, which can be expanded up to 32GB via microSD card. It has all the essential features such as Bluetooth, GPS, and WiFi. This phone is designed for international use and may not include a US warranty. Please contact the seller for specific warranty information.
input_text.Response B: The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C is a 4.3" Dual SIM Android Smartphone running on a Dual Core 1.2GHz CPU with 4GB of ROM and 768MB of RAM. The phone comes with a 5MP Rear Camera with LED Flash, autofocus, and touch focus, as well as a 0.3MP VGA Front Camera. It has a 1800 mAh removable Li-Ion Battery, and supports microSD memory cards up to 32GB. The Samsung Galaxy Trend 3 G3502C runs on Android 4.3 Jelly Bean and includes WiFi, GPS, Bluetooth, and 3G HSDPA 900/2100 MHz connectivity. Please note this phone is an international version and may not include a US warranty.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
